member.name: ITfIntegratableCandidateListUIElement.FinalizeExactCompositionString
member.summary: Finalizes the current composition with the value currently shown to the user.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfIntegratableCandidateListUIElement.GetSelectionStyle
member.param: A value that specifies the selection style.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfIntegratableCandidateListUIElement.OnKeyDown
member.param: Specifies the virtual-key code of the key. For more information about this parameter, see the wParam parameter in WM_KEYDOWN.

Specifies the repeat count, scan code, extended-key flag, context code, previous key-state flag, and transition-state flag of the key. For more information about this parameter, see the lParam parameter in WM_KEYDOWN.
TRUE if the key event was handled; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfIntegratableCandidateListUIElement.SetIntegrationStyle
member.param: The desired type of keyboard integration experience.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The text service supports the integration style.
The text service does not support the integration style.

member.name: ITfIntegratableCandidateListUIElement.ShowCandidateNumbers
member.summary: Specifies whether candidate numbers should be shown.
member.param: TRUE if candidate numbers should be shown; otherwise FALSE.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfIntegratableCandidateListUIElement
member.summary: Enables text services and Input Method Editors (IMEs) to adjust UI-less mode behavior.
